Topic.Title: Adding a set of attributes to all objects

Posts.EditableText: I want to add a worn attribute to all of my objects by default. I can do this by editing each object in the code editor and putting in the attribute definition and default but I don't want to have to do this for every equipable item in the game. What's the suggested method of doing what I want?
Posts.HTML: I want to add a worn attribute to all of my objects by default. I can do this by editing each object in the code editor and putting in the attribute definition and default but I don't want to have to do this for every equipable item in the game. What's the suggested method of doing what I want?

Posts.EditableText: [quote="duggold":15q3e89y]I want to add a worn attribute to all of my objects by default.[/quote:15q3e89y] Really to every object? Then you should work with types Did you see the clothing-library of Chase? http://quest5.net/wiki/Clothing_Library2 Perhaps you want to use it.
Posts.HTML:
duggold wrote:I want to add a worn attribute to all of my objects by default.

Really to every object? Then you should work with types
